\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

    % https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	A & E & \bullet \\
	B & {B \oplus \bullet} & \bullet
	\arrow["a", from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["f"', from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow["t", from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{\binom st}", dashed, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{e_1}"', from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{p_2}"', from=2-2, to=2-3]
\end{tikzcd}
    \end{document}
